channel.title: God VS Monkeys?

Hey i'm just seeing what people think
no dissing other peps coments, or ill eat you.....

or
We came from monekys? [hr] I think monkeys, because it says on tv :P.

item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Personally, I believe in God. He doesn’t ‘make’ miracles, they HAPPEN.

God obviously made something. How did ‘existance’ even happen? How did the first single cell organism even happen. There’s an answer for everything. Just like that old saying-

“Everything happens for a reason.” - ???

item.description:
@Liquicity wrote:

Here’s the real question. God can do anything right? Well can go make a burrito so hot he can’t eat it? If he can then he can’t eat it which is something he can’t do.
tl;dr God can’t do anything if he does in fact exist.

item.title: God VS Monkeys?
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

I believe in God, but.
To everyone else that believes in him. How do you believe it, if you can’t see it?
It’s like me saying, I have the ability to heal, and revive the dead.
OMG! PRAISE ME!!! BOW DOWN TO YOUR MASTER!
Someone is going to say, let me see those skills of yours and then i’ll praise you. People have there own opinion, I respect that. At least they are leaders, and not followers.
I just don’t agree with people accusing God of being a bad God. Cause guess what, you’re still alive aren’t you?

Read full topic

item.title: God VS Monkeys?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Like I said, everyone has their own opinion. My dad fell off a ladder, nearly broke his neck. My sister was in a car crash, report said another 2 inches of metal moving and she would be dead. I have had a number of things happen, and I have just gradually started believing. I really don’t discuss this kind of stuff except with good friends though.

item.title: God VS Monkeys?
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Nahh. I don’t believe we came from from crap.
But, I believe in God a different way than a lot of people. Probably differently than everyone on this forum.

I don’t believe God controls everything. I think God is real, but he doesn’t control us.
I believe in fate. Like, your life is written out. (But, not exactly) Thats the only way I can describe it. I think God created us, and is waiting for us to work together, or fall. Like this sign i saw on this guys truck, “United we stand, Divided we fall.”
Like that kid said up there, “there are people starving and stuff”. Yeah, there are people starving. Are you doing anything about it? Exactly. If you aren’t doing anything, why the hell should he do it? People call on God when they are in trouble, or when they think they are dying.
Tell me something, how many of you people pray every night before bed? Say grace before every meal? I know I don’t. Now how many of you say, “Oh god, please make me feel better.” Or you say, “Dear God, help my family stay healthy.” When someone in your family is dying. I’ll admit, i do it.

So tell me, Why should God do anything if you aren’t? Is it his duty to clean up our dirty work? Not at all. Why should God solve global warming, if we continue to destroy our earth, even when we know the consequences?
Just think tonight before you go to bed, why do I call for God when the going gets rough? But don’t call for him just because I have faith that he’s there.

Read full topic
